channel.title: Syndication on Thomas Levesque's .NET Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Syndication on Thomas Levesque's .NET Blog

item.title: Build an RSS reader in 5 minutes
item.description: Today, I stumbled upon a very handy class : SyndicationFeed. This class, introduced in .NET 3.5, allows to manipulate syndication feeds (like RSS 2.0 or Atom 1.0) with very little code. It can be used to create and publish our own feeds, or to read existing ones. For instance, here’s how to retrieve the news feed from Google News and display its title, its hyperlink, and the titles of it’s items :
